hero.desc: Tactna covers everything you need to launch your service
hero.feature2: Utilize various data linked to IDs

1.title: ID & Account Mastery
1.desc: Tactna is a platform that brings together the best practices in ID and account management. Compared to a full scratch build, it significantly reduces initial setup costs and enables a 36% reduction over 5 years.

2.title: Top-Notch Security
2.desc: With built-in industry-standard authentication features, Tactna implements high-security design by default. By incorporating TC3's best practices, it quickly realizes a common authentication base for multiple services. Additionally, as a fully managed service, it spares you the operational burdens.

3.title: B2B Ready
3.desc: For B2B services, ensuring a service supports application usage rights and contract plans, in addition to simple user login, is crucial. Tactna has these implementations in place by default, eliminating the need for complex requirements definition or design.

4.title: Ultimate Flexibility
4.desc: In business expansion, seamless operation involves integration with core systems like payment services, internal contract management systems, and accounting systems. Tactna can flexibly adapt to different specifications from each service provider.

5.title: Efficient Operations
5.desc: By implementing portal features, which are said to account for 20% of development costs, it alleviates the need for engineers to handle ID-related tasks after going live.

6.title: Data-Centric Insights
6.desc: Tactna functions as a platform for analyzing active user numbers and company profiles. It enables a comprehensive view of user statuses, forming the basis for various initiatives.

metadata.title: Tactna | Account & User Management Platform
metadata.description: Tactna is a platform that provides account management, authentication and authorization services, enabling rapid deployment of your services.

compare_detail.subtitle: With Tactna, achieve a high-performance ID management platform while significantly reducing development effort
compare_detail.reduce_dev_effort_enterprise: Achieve enterprise-level ID management infrastructure while reducing development effort.

msad.quote: This common authentication infrastructure project is a crucial feature for our company to deploy multiple digital services. I am pleased that we were able to implement comprehensive coverage among various possible services. Through PoC and requirements definition discussions with TC3, we were able to implement a solid common authentication infrastructure.
msad.department: Digital Innovation Division, DI Promotion Department

gsearch.quote: By adopting the Tactna Identity Platform, we were able to establish the foundation for the 'data utilization' we ultimately want to achieve. We plan to migrate all services onto Tactna in the future. By eliminating the individual costs of considering and implementing identity domains that would normally be considered for each application, including authentication/authorization and organizational concepts, we expect to be able to focus on application development. We also look forward to powerful updates to Tactna in the future.

structured_data.website_description: Tactna is a platform that provides account management, authentication and authorization services, enabling rapid deployment of your services.
